title: Ep 173: A Gouda Time Was Had By All with Georgia Clark
itunes:title: Ep 173: A Gouda Time Was Had By All with Georgia Clark
itunes:subtitle: Kate finds a novel use for a Louise Penny book and Doree prepares for a long overdue weekend away. Then, author and performer, Georgia Clark joins them on the pod to talk about her nightly cheese plate, how hot yoga led her to reframe a childhood narra...
description:
Kate finds a novel use for a Louise Penny book and Doree prepares for a long overdue weekend away. Then, author and performer, Georgia Clark joins them on the pod to talk about her nightly cheese plate, how hot yoga led her to reframe a childhood narrative, and why she and her wife traveled across the country for nine weeks during the pandemic. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 

Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
